artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson

Colas 1936
Cabinet des Modes
Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Trifold sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,437); at left are three elaborate women's hats; in the center is a woman in a green gown with purple trim and a purple sash around her waist, white gloves, and a white hat with pink ribbon and bows and white plumes; on the right a man holding a bouquet of red flowers in black breeches, socks, and coat
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Fashion plate from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Quatrième Année, Trente-unième Cahier, 21 Octobre 1789
